scripts.generate:api: setx PRISMA_CLIENT_ENGINE_TYPE binary && dotenv -e apps/api/prisma/.env -- npx prisma db pull --schema ./apps/api/prisma/schema.prisma && prisma generate --schema ./apps/api/prisma/schema.prisma && tsx scripts/split-prisma.ts && node scripts/rearrange-dtos-entities.js && tsx scripts/generate-modules.ts && ts-node --compiler-options "{\"module\":\"CommonJS\"}" scripts/generate-response-dtos.ts && tsx scripts/cleanup-dtos.ts && prettier --write "packages/shared/src/models/**/*.{ts,tsx}"
scripts.db:pull:api: setx PRISMA_CLIENT_ENGINE_TYPE binary && dotenv -e apps/api/prisma/.env -- npx prisma db pull --schema=apps/api/prisma/schema.prisma
